short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that permanently hides the mini-player that appears in the bottom right when browsing YouTube

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube Mini-Player Blocker - A browser extension that permanently disables the mini-player that appears in the bottom right corner when browsing YouTube in a web browser.

We are asking for donations for future development!
